test.description: Check to see if the target method exists.
Normal operation, white box test, return value must be numeric

A NULL denominator returns 0. This may not be what you think would be the correct answer, but we are assuming it is what the business needs for this test.
A NULL numerator returns 0. This may not be what you think would be the correct answer, but we are assuming it is what the business needs for this test.
A zero numerator returns 0. This may not be what you think would be the correct answer, but we are assuming it is what the business needs for this test.
